wikipedia_page.main: Donald Brumson Solomon Jr. (born 2 October 1989) is a Caymanian footballer who plays as a defender. He  has represented the Cayman Islands during the 2010 Caribbean Championship and World Cup qualifying matches in 2008 and 2011.He was one of a group of Caymanian players identified by the country's football federation who they believed would benefit from playing overseas. He joined Ashford Town (Middlesex) in England after being invited over in late 2010 on an initial short term basis, although the move was extended then until the end of the season. He made one first-team appearance for the club as a substitute.
